```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r cars}
pairs = data_frame()

for (i in 1:length(ourEnhancerData)){
  trytry = data.frame(distance(ourEnhancerData[i], PROData, ignore.strand=TRUE))

  colnames(trytry) = c("Distance")
  trytry$gene_row = as.integer(rownames(trytry))
  new_trytry = trytry %>% filter(Distance>2000)
  new_trytry$enhancer_row = i
  
  pairs <- rbind(pairs, new_trytry)
}


```
